The statement made by State Senate Minor: 000 Wisconsinites have lost their job since Governor Walker and the Republicans took over in January.
The reference to the Bureau of Labor Sta: which showed that 239,916 Wisconsin residents were without a job in August 2011, compared to 225,983 in January when Walker took office.
